original_text: And on the fifteenth day of the seventh month ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work, and ye shall keep a feast unto the Lord seven days:
korean_text: 일곱째 달 열다섯째 날에는 너희가 성회로 모일 것이요 아무 일도 하지 말 것이며 이레 동안 여호와 앞에 절기를 지킬 것이라

sentences.original_text: And on the fifteenth day of the seventh month
ye shall have an holy convocation
ye shall do no servile work
and ye shall keep a feast unto the Lord
